content: the **desert cacti zipper pouch** is a very colorful and picturesque tapestry crochet pattern worked in the round using 3 strands of yarn the same image is crocheted on both sides of the clutch the free pattern only has written instructions available while the premium pdf also contains a printable color chart the pdf pattern also provides a tutorial on how to line the pouch the same tutorial is available on my blog here 1 **materials** 3 0-mm c usa 11 uk hook sport weight 2 fine yarn tapestry needle sewing needle one stitch marker to work in the round zipper 8 20 cm optional lining fabric pins sewing thread **yarn color reference & yardage** color a marine 124 43 8 yds 40 m color b ocean 400 30 7 yds 28 m color c jade 253 35 6 yds 33 m color d vanille 403 5 5 yds 5 m color e orange 281 9 yds 8 25 m color f altrosa 408 12 yds 11 m color g erdbeere 258 16 yds 14 5 m color h white 106 6 6 yds 6 m color i flieder 226 18 yds 16 5 m **size** 8 2 by 5 5 21 cm by 14 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni 1 https //raffamusadesigns com/line-crochet-zipper-bag/
